experience.description: Led the development of the front-end for SecondGen's new interactive member portal.
Led the development of a customizable website template and mobile applications that were used at over 16 hackathons.

experience.organization: Monta Vista Web and Mobile Development Club
experience.description: Created the club's new member portal and led the Android and web curriculum development for the 2016-2017 school year.
Led workshops teaching students how to program in Java and Python, and created curriculum for and taught an App Development workshop using MIT AppInventor.

experience.organization: Monta Vista Web and Mobile Development Club
experience.description: Created the club's new member portal and led the Android and web curriculum development for the 2016-2017 school year.

projects.name: fbash
projects.description: A Node.js based tool which allows developers to access their command-line through Facebook Messenger and provides additional utilities for collaboration. It is open-source on GitHub and has received an average of 800 installs monthly.

projects.name: SwiftAssist
awards: Best Use of Microsoft Technologies and Finalist @ Los Altos Hacks
projects.description: A cross-platform application which leverages crowd-sourcing of rapid emergency response. I built the Android and Pebble Smartwatch applications.

projects.name: Flappy Nerd
projects.description: A Flappy Bird-based game which takes advantage of its addictive nature to assist the user in studying effectively with data drawn from Quizlet.

projects.name: IncubateX Android App
projects.description: An app which allows hackathon participants to view the time left to hack in a countdown format, displays the event's schedule and venue map, and delivers targeted push notifications based on location.
